meanings.sent1: Running into a wall can ake your head hurt.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise made my ears ake.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful pounce akes my heart with joy.
meanings.sent4: The loss of a loved one can ake the soul deeply.
meanings.sent5: The sharp words ake more than any physical pain.

meanings.sent1: She winced in response to the ake in her side.
meanings.sent2: The ake in his tooth made it hard to eat.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected ake in her foot made her jump comically.
meanings.sent4: The ake in his heart was a reminder of his past mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The ake in her muscles after exercise was a sign of progress.
